creator: apache-bugzilla@distributopia.com
text:
GenericServlet has calls to log() in init() and destroy().
They probably shouldn't be there, since they clog up otherwise
pristine log files. This is especially important since the
servletapi project is supposed to be reusable in non-Tomcat 
containers.

 Apologies if this is the wrong bug category. There's wasn't
a 'jakarta-servletapi-4' entry on the initial bug entry page,
or in the Tomcat 4 'Component' list.
